attributes.action: Stop supporting Ukraine and fueling this proxy war between US and Russia.
attributes.additional_details:
We want to put an end to the cost of living crisis which is having a detrimental impact on every British citizen. Stop withstanding your political beleifs, this is indeed an aftermath of the 20th century Cold War - and definetly not something that the public is proposing.

Start caring for the British public NOT your orthodox political ideologies. 

Lift the sanctions off Russia and END inflation and this artificial and unnesecery cost of living crisis.
attributes.background: We want the British goverment to stop getting involed in a irrelevant war that is taking place millions of miles away. The Ukraine war is a problem between Russia and Ukraine - it is not something that Britain should be concerned about.
